hero.headline: Anthropic Acquires Bun: AI Giant Absorbs Fastest JavaScript Runtime
hero.summary: In a surprise move that sent shockwaves through the developer community, Anthropic has acquired Bun, the ultra-fast JavaScript runtime that challenged Node.js supremacy. The acquisition positions Anthropic to deeply integrate AI-native tooling directly into the JavaScript ecosystem.
hero.whyItMatters: This signals Anthropic's ambition beyond LLMs into developer infrastructure. With Claude Code already leading agentic coding, owning the runtime layer could enable unprecedented AI-native development workflows where the runtime itself is AI-aware.

topStories.title: Critical OpenAI Codex CLI Vulnerability Patched (CVE-2025-61260)
topStories.summary: Check Point Research discovered a CVSS 9.8 supply chain vulnerability allowing attackers to execute arbitrary commands via malicious .env files and MCP server configs. OpenAI patched it in v0.23.0, highlighting risks in AI coding tools trusting project configs.

topStories.title: Claude Code Comes to the Web: Delegate Tasks from Your Browser
topStories.summary: Anthropic launched Claude Code on the web in research preview, allowing users to assign multiple coding tasks that run on Anthropic-managed cloud infrastructure. Available for Pro, Max, Team, and Enterprise users with the new checkpoint system for safe autonomous operation.

topStories.title: OpenAI Launches GPT-5.1-Codex-Max for Extended Coding Sessions
topStories.summary: OpenAI introduced GPT-5.1-Codex-Max, their new frontier agentic coding model. It's the first model natively trained to work across multiple context windows through 'compaction', enabling project-scale refactors and multi-hour agent loops. 95% of OpenAI engineers now use Codex weekly.

topStories.title: GELab-Zero: Step.fun Releases State-of-the-Art GUI Agent
topStories.summary: Step.fun's GUI Exploration Lab offers one of the best GUI agent solutions, enabling AI to interact with graphical interfaces. As agentic AI matures, GUI automation becomes critical for real-world task execution beyond terminal-based workflows.

trendingRepos.name: deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-Math-V2
trendingRepos.description: Second-generation mathematical reasoning model from DeepSeek, pushing open-source AI capabilities in formal reasoning and problem-solving.

trendingRepos.name: langchain-ai/langchain
trendingRepos.description: The platform for building reliable AI agents with Python, enterprise frameworks, multi-agent systems, and RAG integrations for OpenAI, Gemini, and Anthropic.

trendingRepos.name: stepfun-ai/gelab-zero
trendingRepos.description: GUI Exploration Lab - One of the best GUI agent solutions powered by Step's research capabilities for visual interface automation.

trendingRepos.name: google-gemini/gemini-cli
trendingRepos.description: Open-source AI agent bringing the power of Gemini directly into your terminal with MCP support and 1M token context. Free tier with 60 requests/min.

trendingSkills.name: Code Duplication Detector
trendingSkills.description: Identifies repeated code segments within projects to improve code quality and reduce maintenance burden.

trendingSkills.name: Dependency Tracker
trendingSkills.description: Monitors and manages project dependencies, helping developers stay on top of updates and security vulnerabilities.

trendingSkills.name: Best Practices Checker
trendingSkills.description: Validates code compliance with industry standards and coding conventions for cleaner, more maintainable codebases.

trendingSkills.name: Security Scanner
trendingSkills.description: Scans for potential security vulnerabilities in codebases, helping identify risks before they become exploits.

newMcpServers.name: database-server
newMcpServers.description: Comprehensive database server supporting PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite with natural language SQL query capabilities. Enables AI agents to interact with databases through both direct SQL and natural language queries.

newMcpServers.name: github-official
newMcpServers.description: Official GitHub MCP Server by GitHub. Provides seamless integration with GitHub APIs, enabling advanced automation and interaction capabilities for file operations, repository management, and search.

newMcpServers.name: waystation
newMcpServers.description: Connect AI to your productivity ecosystem with integrations across Notion, Slack, Asana, Monday.com, and 50+ other business tools.

newMcpServers.name: openapi
newMcpServers.description: Fetch, validate, and generate code or curl commands from any OpenAPI or Swagger spec - all from a single URL. Perfect for API exploration and testing.

highlights: Added feedback input when rejecting plans, allowing users to tell Claude what to change
VSCode now supports streaming messages for real-time response display
Enhanced fuzzy matching for file suggestions with faster, more accurate results
New hooks system for tool execution, LLM requests/responses, and agent lifecycle integration
Session browser component with /resume slash command for continuing previous sessions
Databricks auth support and custom header options for enterprise integrations
Critical security patch for CVE-2025-61260 command injection vulnerability
Prevents .env files from silently redirecting CODEX_HOME into project directories
History lookup enabled on Windows and WSL clipboard image path handling fixed

notableQuotes.quote: Prompt engineering is very much alive—and more important than ever. Prompt quality can make or break AI performance—especially when scaled across products.
notableQuotes.author: Sander Schulhoff

notableQuotes.quote: A single malicious file could compromise an entire development environment. When a developer clones the repository and runs Codex, the tool automatically executes embedded commands without warnings.
notableQuotes.author: Check Point Research

notableQuotes.quote: Building with language models is becoming less about finding the right words and more about answering the broader question of 'what configuration of context is most likely to generate our model's desired behavior?'
notableQuotes.author: Anthropic Engineering

allSources.title: Effective Context Engineering for AI Agents

prompt: Generate AI news digest by fetching aggregated feed, searching for Claude Code/Gemini CLI/OpenAI Codex news, fetching changelogs, pulling skills from SkillsMP, discovering MCP servers, and compiling into structured JSON with hero story, top stories, trending repos, trending skills, MCP servers, tool updates, and notable quotes for prompt engineering audience.
